text: The student care is small cozy outfit and the teachers really take care of the kids. Kids have a lot of fun and forge deep relationships with each other. Lots of good holiday programmes as well. My kid really enjoyed herself and was well taken care of.

Ekidz Student Care is outstanding! My kids even ask why they can't go to the center on weekends, obviously they love it that much. The staff are incredibly patient and dedicated, providing personalized attention to each child. The learning programs are excellent, fostering both academic and personal growth. They also provide nutritious meals that keep the kids energized and healthy. This center creates a supportive and inclusive community where children truly thrive.

Highly recommended, one of the best student care centers in Singaporeüëçüèª
Great student care centre with cozy environment and responsible teachers. Most of the kids are from HPPS.

I just wanted to say how pleased I am with the eKidz Student Care. My child enjoys being there, especially with the caring staff. The activities are fantastic, and I appreciate the effort put into making it engaging for the kids. Thanks for providing a positive and safe place for my child.

Ekidz is a recommended after school care centre. I am very assured to leave my children in the good care of the dedicated teachers , who ensure that the children are fed healthy food, complete their homework properly,  and have time for interaction with other primary school children at the centre .
